item.title: ‘Five Nights at Freddy’s’ Panel Teases Big Scares But Not Reveals at Comic-Con
item.description: “It’s rare that you get to be apart of something that so many people connect to,” actor Josh Hutcherson said of appearing in the popular franchise that has its own rabid fanbase.

item.title: ‘Five Nights at Freddy’s’ Panel Teases Big Scares But Not Reveals at Comic-Con
